body.p: The player rating parameters script allows you to tune how the game variant affects a player's Arena rating. Arena was the system that Bungie designed for Halo: Reach in an attempt to rank players by skill. It is no longer used; 343 Industries relies on TrueSkill 2, a system that uses kills per minute, deaths per minute, and machine learning to determine a player's skill level.
The fields available to edit are as follows:

dl.dd: Weights the effect that kills have on the rating compared to the usual.
Weights the effect that assists have on the rating compared to the usual.
Weights the effect that betrayals have on the rating compared to the usual.
Weights the effect that deaths have on the rating compared to the usual.
Unknown. Presumably functions as a boolean (0 or 1) despite being implemented as a float.
